column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I was going to meet up with my friends at the mall to watch a new movie that recently came out .
#text=But , since the mall is pretty far away , I needed to take the bus .
#text=So , I went online to the bus ' site to check the time that the Mall Route bus would be near my house .
#text=I marked the times down on my phone and got ready to leave .
#text=I sent a text to my friends and let them know that I could make it and that I 'd been there soon .
#text=I grabbed my jacket , wallet , and made sure to get my bus pass .
#text=I checked the time and set off .
#text=I walked a few blocks to the bus stop and double checked the time .
#text=I had to wait for a little bit , but it 's always better to get to the stop early , since sometimes the bus is n't quite on schedule .
#text=The bus finally pulled up and I got on .
#text=I swiped my card and I found a decent seat .
#text=Luckily , there were n't that many people on board and the stops were short .
#text=As the bus got closer to the mall , and it was nearing the stop , I pulled on the line that let the driver know that she needed to let someone off .
#text=I made it to the mall in good time and got to hang out with my friends a bit before the movie .
